title: Scrum and Sprints
description: A quick win: understand Scrum and Sprints.

hook.text: Break work into two-week chunks called sprints. Deliver something usable every single time.

discovery.text: Short sprints force prioritization. You build the most valuable thing first because time is limited.

climax.text: Scrum works when teams own the process. It fails when it's imposed from above without trust.

punchline.text: Ship every two weeks or learn why you can't.

quiz.question: What is a sprint in Scrum?
options: A fixed time period to deliver working software
